title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view and choosing the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu, nothing happens.
EB: I expect that when I select a field in the Type Hierarchy view and choose 'Add Javadoc' from the context menu, the action should add Javadoc to the selected field.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Select a field in the Type Hierarchy view.
